name: Book Store
description: Web application for re-buying various books at low prices. The site has a convenient admin panel for managing goods, tracking statistics and financial status. There are many interactive elements, search, filtering, shopping cart. The books are made as 3D models.
purpose: Convenient interface, speed of work, good UX, UI.
solution: Separated frontend and backend, used Nuxt.js framework together with Bootstrap

worksFields.title: No registration
worksFields.desc: Users do not need to register / log in to make purchases or store items in the shopping cart.

worksFields.title: Convenient search
worksFields.desc: Users can search and filter books by price and other parameters thanks to a convenient and fast system.

worksFields.title: Nice UI
worksFields.desc: The design of the site is thought out in such a way that the buyer understands from the first seconds what actions he can perform.

worksFields.title: Functional admin panel
worksFields.desc: An admin panel has been created for the administrator to manage goods with statistics and graphs.
